item.text: (See what sort of love the Father has given to us: that we should be called God’s children—and indeed we are! For this reason the world does not know us: Because it did not know him.

<st data-num="27">Dear friends</st>, we <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="5043" class="">children</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> we will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st><n id="1" /> has <st data-num="3768">not yet</st> been <st data-num="5319" class="">revealed</st>. We<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1437" class="">whenever</st><n id="4" /> it<n id="5" /> is <st data-num="5319" class="">revealed</st><n id="6" /> we will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="3664" class="">like</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st><n id="7" /> we will <st data-num="3708">see</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2531">just as</st> he <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st>.<n id="8" />
And everyone who has this hope focused on him purifies himself, just as Jesus is pure).
Everyone who practices sin also practices lawlessness; indeed, sin is lawlessness.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> you <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">Jesus</st><n id="1" /> was <st data-num="5319" class="">revealed</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="142">take away</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="266" class="">sins</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> there <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st>.

<st data-num="3956" class="">Everyone</st> who <st data-num="3306" class="">resides</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="264" class="">does</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="264" class="">sin</st>;<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3956" class="">everyone</st> who <st data-num="264" class="">sins</st> has <st data-num="3756" class="">neither</st> <st data-num="3708" class="">seen</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3761" class="">nor</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">known</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="5040">Little children</st>, <st data-num="4105" class="">let</st> <st data-num="3367" class="">no one</st> <st data-num="4105" class="">deceive</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you:</st> The one who <st data-num="4160" class="">practices</st> <st data-num="1343" class="">righteousness</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1342" class="">righteous</st>, <st data-num="2531">just as</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">Jesus</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1342" class="">righteous</st>.

<st data-num="3588" class="">The</st> one who <st data-num="4160" class="">practices</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="1228" class="">devil</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> the <st data-num="1228" class="">devil</st> has been <st data-num="264" class="">sinning</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="746" class="">beginning</st>. <st data-num="1519" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3778">this purpose</st><n id="3" /> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> was <st data-num="5319">revealed</st>: <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3089" class="">destroy</st><n id="4" /> the <st data-num="2041" class="">works</st> of the <st data-num="1228" class="">devil</st>.

<st data-num="3956" class="">Everyone</st> who has been <st data-num="1080" class="">fathered</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1537" class="">by</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">practice</st> <st data-num="266">sin</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="846" class="">God’s</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="4690" class="">seed</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="3306" class="">resides</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, and <st data-num="2532" class="">thus</st><n id="6" /> he <st data-num="1410" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="264" class="">sin</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> he has been <st data-num="1080" class="">fathered</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">by</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.
By this the children of God and the children of the devil are revealed: Everyone who does not practice righteousness—the one who does not love his fellow Christian—is not of God.
For this is the gospel message that you have heard from the beginning: that we should love one another,
not like Cain who was of the evil one and brutally murdered his brother. And why did he murder him? Because his deeds were evil, but his brother’s were righteous.
Therefore do not be surprised, brothers and sisters, if the world hates you.

<st data-num="1473" class="">We</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st><n id="1" /> we have <st data-num="3327">crossed over</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st><n id="4" /> we <st data-num="25" class="">love</st> our <st data-num="80">fellow Christians</st>.<n id="5" /> The one who does <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="25" class="">love</st> <st data-num="3306" class="">remains</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st>.<n id="6" />

<st data-num="3956" class="">Everyone</st> who <st data-num="3404" class="">hates</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="80">fellow Christian</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> a <st data-num="443" class="">murderer</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="443" class="">murderer</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> <st data-num="166" class="">eternal</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st> <st data-num="3306" class="">residing</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

We have come to <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> <st data-num="26" class="">love</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="3778">this</st>:<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">Jesus</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="5087" class="">laid down</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5590" class="">life</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>; <st data-num="2532" class="">thus</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> <st data-num="3784" class="">ought</st> to <st data-num="5087">lay down</st> our <st data-num="5590" class="">lives</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> our <st data-num="80">fellow Christians</st>.
But whoever has the world’s possessions and sees his fellow Christian in need and shuts off his compassion against him, how can the love of God reside in such a person?
Little children, let us not love with word or with tongue but in deed and truth.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st><n id="1" /> we will <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> we <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> will <st data-num="3982" class="">convince</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">conscience</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1715" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1715" class="">presence</st>,<n id="4" />

<st data-num="3754" class="">that</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">conscience</st> <st data-num="2607" class="">condemns</st><n id="2" /> us, <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3173">greater</st> than <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">conscience</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">knows</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all things</st>.

<st data-num="27">Dear friends</st>, <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> <st data-num="1473">our</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">conscience</st> does <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2607" class="">condemn</st> us, we <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="3954" class="">confidence</st> <st data-num="4314">in the presence of</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3739 1437">whatever</st> we <st data-num="154" class="">ask</st> we <st data-num="2983" class="">receive</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st><n id="2" /> we <st data-num="5083" class="">keep</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1785" class="">commandments</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> the things that are <st data-num="701" class="">pleasing</st> <st data-num="1799" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Now</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1785" class="">commandment</st>:<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st> we <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> in the <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="25" class="">love</st> <st data-num="240">one another</st>, <st data-num="2531">just as</st> he <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> the <st data-num="1785" class="">commandment</st>.
And the person who keeps his commandments resides in God, and God in him. Now by this we know that God resides in us: by the Spirit he has given us.
